item.title: By: Dreaming
item.dc:creator: Dreaming
item.description: Ah thanks, we had him down to like 20%, guess all those lowbies inside org thought they'd try to "help"
item.content:encoded: Ah thanks, we had him down to like 20%, guess all those lowbies inside org thought they’d try to “help”

item.title: By: SavageLabyrinth
item.dc:creator: SavageLabyrinth
item.description:
The shadowbolt spam thing is when more than 40 characters attack him at once. We (the Horde) got him down to 18% in Orgrimmar before more people arrived; then it was mass chaos and he was invincible.
Just a tip, in case he comes back round again.
item.content:encoded:
The shadowbolt spam thing is when more than 40 characters attack him at once. We (the Horde) got him down to 18% in Orgrimmar before more people arrived; then it was mass chaos and he was invincible.

Just a tip, in case he comes back round again.

item.title: By: Dreaming
item.dc:creator: Dreaming
item.description: We almost downed him, but he started spamcasting that shadbolt thing every 1.5 seconds. Not sure whether that is intended or he bugged out.
item.content:encoded: We almost downed him, but he started spamcasting that shadbolt thing every 1.5 seconds. Not sure whether that is intended or he bugged out.
